price: Nanso wͻn nuanom (abͻneεfoͻ no, ͻbonsam) de wͻn kͻ bͻne ne ͻyera mu akyirikyiri na wͻntwa (bɔne yε no) so.
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
